column1: Uchi////My boyfriend and I decided to try out Uchi since we've heard rave reviews about it. First off
column2: we went on a Thursday so it wasn't that busy. Our server greeted us almost right away. He was really nice and attentive and he had great people skills. So
column3: he made our visit more pleasurable. I liked everything that we tried. My only complaint at Uchi was that the food took forever to come out.. We were there for almost 2-3 hours. Everything came out one by one with like a 20 min interval in between the plates. I was hungry
column4: so I was wondering what was taking so long. But eventually we tried the:
